targets.query: SELECT "run_number" FROM "dunedaq.rcif.opmon.RunInfo" WHERE "session" = '${session}' AND "run_number" >0 AND $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_udp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sent_ping_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_udp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_arp_count"), 1s)FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(last("sent_arp_count"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("rcvd_ping_count"),1s) FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, element, detector, crate, slot, link fill(null)
SELECT mean("ipackets") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("ibytes") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("opackets") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("obytes") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("imissed") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("ierrors") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("oerrors") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT mean("rx_nombuf") FROM  "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_good_packets") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsInfo"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_good_bytes") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsInfo"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT mean("rx_size_1523_to_max_packets") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsInfo"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("rx_dropped_packets") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsInfo"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("rx_missed_errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsErrors"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)
SELECT sum("rx_errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsErrors"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("rx_crc_errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsErrors"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("rx_illegal_byte_errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsErrors"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("rx_jabber_errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthXStatsErrors"  WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), element fill(null)

SELECT sum("packets") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueEthXStats" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application=~/${application}/ AND queue=~/.*-${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, queue, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("errors") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueEthXStats" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application=~/${application}/ AND queue=~/.*-${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, queue, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("bytes") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueEthXStats" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application=~/${application}/ AND queue=~/.*-${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY element, queue, time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("packets_received"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND queue =~ /${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, "queue" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("bytes_received"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND queue =~ /${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, "queue" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("full_rx_burst"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND queue =~ /${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, "queue" fill(null)

SELECT mean("max_burst_size") FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND queue =~ /${queue}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), application, "queue" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("processed_frames"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.nicreaderinfo.SourceStats" WHERE ("partition_id" = '${partition}' AND "source_id"=~/[^.]+\.${application}\.[^.]+\.[^.]+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("dropped_frames"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.SourceInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application=~/${application}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "subelement" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_seq_id_errors"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_ts_errors"), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

SELECT min("min_seq_id_jump")  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

panels.title: Min Sequence ID jump at DLH

targets.query: SELECT max("max_seq_id_jump")  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "element" fill(null)

panels.title: Max Sequence ID jump at DLH

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("num_seq_id_errors"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("num_ts_errors"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_seq_id_jump")  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT min("min_seq_id_jump") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND element =~ /${DLH}/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Min/Max Sequence ID jump at DLH for application ${application}

list.definition: SELECT "application" FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "application" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND $timeFilter)
list.label: CRP Controller
list.name: CRP
list.query: SELECT "application" FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "application" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT element FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "element" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: WIB
list.name: WIB
list.query: SELECT element FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "element" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", detector AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Detector
list.name: detector
list.query: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", detector AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", crate AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND  $timeFilter)
list.label: Crate
list.name: crate
list.query: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", crate AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND  $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", slot AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Slot
list.name: slot
list.query: SELECT data FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", slot AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT link FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "link" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Link
list.name: link
list.query: SELECT link FROM  (SELECT "sent_udp_count", "link" FROM "dunedaq.hermesmodules.opmon.LinkInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${CRP}/ AND element =~ /${WIB}/ AND detector =~ /${detector}/ AND crate =~ /${crate}/ AND slot=~ /${slot}/ AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT application FROM (SELECT "ipackets", "application" FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats" WHERE session = '${session}' AND $timeFilter )
list.label: Readout Application
list.name: application
list.query: SELECT application FROM (SELECT "ipackets", "application" FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.EthStats" WHERE session = '${session}' AND $timeFilter )

list.definition: SELECT queue FROM (SELECT "packets_received", "queue" FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )
list.label: Queue
list.name: queue
list.query: SELECT queue FROM (SELECT "packets_received", "queue" FROM "dunedaq.dpdklibs.opmon.QueueInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )

list.definition: SELECT element FROM (SELECT num_seq_id_errors, element FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )
list.label: DLH
list.name: DLH
list.query: SELECT element FROM (SELECT num_seq_id_errors, element FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.opmon.FixedRateDataProcessorInfo" WHERE session = '${session}' AND application =~ /${application}/ AND $timeFilter )
